title: MEMORY REFERENCE Capsule
description: Declarative, symbolic reference to a memory without requesting retrieval or content injection.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the memory reference.

hash.description: Deterministic hash of the canonicalized capsule. Computed externally.

memory_id.description: Opaque, symbolic identifier of the referenced memory.

intent.description: Human-readable reason for referencing the memory without retrieval.

memory_domain.description: Optional classification of the memory domain (e.g. relational, episodic, policy).

consent_reference.description: Optional capsule_id of a CONSENT ASSERTION relevant to this reference.

notes.description: Optional human-readable notes clarifying the use of the reference.
